content: the artist s garden scarf a breezy spring day a field of flowers is what inspired me to create this one skein scarf the asymmetrical crescent shape and the lace details gives it a feminine ethereal look 1 www unrulystitch com- instagram @unrulystitch the artist s garden scarf difficulty level intermediate materials ◆ 1 skein of woolen women fibers fingering weight yarn 438yds/100g or any fingering weight yarn to match gauge ◆ us 3/3 25mm circular needles 24 /60cm long ◆ scissors ◆ tapestry needle gauge unblocked knit in stockinette stitch flat on size us3/3 25mm needles 19 sts x 24 row = 3 2 www unrulystitch com- instagram @unrulystitch glossary co cast on p2tog purl 2 together bobble bind off k knit ssk slip slip knit p purl p2tog tbl purl 2 together yo yarn over through back loops see k2tog knit 2 together link below helpful links how to p2tog tbl how to purl 2 together through the back loop p2togtbl | p2tog tbl | p2tog tbl wildflower knot stitch https //youtu be/qkzglejatgy stretchy bind off https //www youtube com/watch v=ol8az7z_iss 3 www unrulystitch com- instagram @unrulystitch pattern with your us3/3 25mm needles co 4 sts using the long tail cast on set up row r1-4 knit garter section 1 r1 k until 2 sts remain yo k1 yo k1 2 sts increased r2 k2 yo k until 2 sts remain k2tog repeat row 1-2 25 more times you will have 56 st at this point stockinette section r1 k until 2 sts remain yo k1 yo k1 2 sts increased r2 p2 yo p until 2 sts remain p2tog repeat row 1-2 11 more times you will have 80 st at this point garter section 2 r1 k until 2 sts remain yo k1 yo k1 2 sts increased r2 k2 yo k until 2 sts remain k2tog repeat row 1-2 11 more times you will have 104 st at this point 4 www unrulystitch com- instagram @unrulystitch pattern alternating leaf section r1 k until 2 sts remain yo k1 yo k1 106 st r2 p2 yo p until 2 sts remain p2tog r3 k3 * k2tog k1 yo k6 repeat from * to the last 4 st k2 yo k1 yo k1 108 st r4 p2 yo p2 yo p1 p2tog * p6 yo p1 p2tog repeat from * to the last 2 st p2tog r5 k9 * k2tog k1 yo k6 repeat from * to last 9 st k2tog k1 yo k4 yo k1 yo k1 110 st r6 p2 yo p1 * p6 yo p1 p2tog repeat from * to the last 8 st p6 p2tog row 7 and 8 repeat row 1 and 2 112 st r9 k3 yo k1 ssk * k6 yo k1 ssk repeat from * to last 7 st k5 yo k1 yo k1 114 st r10 p2 yo p6 * p2tog tbl p1 yo p6 repeat from * to last 7 st p2tog tbl p1 yo p2 p2tog
